TaxRate.name: TaxRate
TaxRate.description: Represents a tax rate for a tax code and country.

GeoCountryId.description: The ID of the GeoCountry for which the tax rate applies. You can define only one tax rate per GeoCountry and tax code combination.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, it's possible the user accessed data in this record or list view but didn't viewed it directly.

Name.description: The unique ID of the tax rate.

OwnerId.description: The TaxRate record owner. By default, the record owner is the user who created the record.

Rate.description: The tax percentage rate that will be applied to orders.

TaxCode.description: The code used to calculate the tax rate for the invoice line.
